name: Jordan 1 Cool Gray
description: The Jordan 1 Cool Gray is a classic sneaker known for its clean design and versatile style, perfect for both casual wear and collectors.
features: High-quality leather upper
Durable rubber outsole
Lightweight cushioning for comfort
Iconic Off-White design elements
careInstructions: Clean with a damp cloth. Avoid exposure to direct sunlight for extended periods.

name: Jordan 4 Blue
description: The Jordan 4 Blue combines retro heritage with modern flair, featuring bold color blocking and legendary Air cushioning for all-day comfort.
features: Premium nubuck upper with mesh paneling
Visible Air-Sole unit in heel
Herringbone outsole for traction
Classic Flight branding and TPU eyelets
careInstructions: Spot clean with mild soap and water. Do not machine wash. Air dry only.

name: Nike Air Max 90 Orange
description: The Nike Air Max 90 Orange reinvents the classic silhouette with striking color pops and the iconic Max Air cushioning that delivers timeless comfort and street-ready style.
features: Durable leather and mesh upper for breathability
Visible Max Air unit for lightweight cushioning
Rubber outsole with waffle pattern for traction
Padded collar and flex grooves for natural movement
careInstructions: Clean with a soft brush and warm water. Avoid machine washing. Let air dry away from direct sunlight.

name: Nike Air Max 90 Beige
description: The Nike Air Max 90 Beige delivers refined streetwear style with a neutral tone palette, iconic Max Air cushioning, and premium materials built for everyday comfort.
features: Smooth suede and mesh upper in neutral tones
Signature Max Air unit for responsive cushioning
Waffle outsole for multi-surface traction
Low-top design with padded collar for classic comfort
careInstructions: Use a suede brush or soft cloth for cleaning. Avoid direct heat. Air dry naturally.

name: Asics GEL-1130
description: The Asics GEL-1130 blends early 2000s running design with modern comfort, featuring GEL cushioning and a breathable build thatâ€™s perfect for daily wear.
features: Mesh and synthetic upper for lightweight support
GEL technology for shock absorption
TRUSSTIC system for stability
Padded tongue and collar for all-day comfort
careInstructions: Clean with a soft damp cloth. Avoid soaking. Air dry away from direct sunlight.

name: Nike P-6000
description: The Nike P-6000 merges retro running aesthetics with breathable mesh and layered overlays, offering all-day comfort in a bold, Y2K-inspired silhouette.
features: Breathable mesh with horizontal and vertical overlays
Foam midsole with lightweight cushioning
Rubber outsole for durable traction
Padded collar and tongue for comfort and support
careInstructions: Wipe with a damp cloth. Air dry. Avoid harsh cleaning products or machine washing.

name: Nike Air Force 1 Black
description: The Nike Air Force 1 Black keeps it classic with a clean monochrome look and legendary Air cushioning. A timeless street icon built for everyday wear.
features: Full-grain leather upper for a premium feel
Encapsulated Air-Sole unit for lightweight cushioning
Non-marking rubber outsole with pivot point for traction
Low-cut silhouette for a streamlined, versatile look
careInstructions: Wipe with a damp cloth. Use leather cleaner as needed. Do not machine wash or dry.

name: Nike Air Force 1 White
description: The Nike Air Force 1 White delivers iconic style with a crisp all-white finish, soft cushioning, and a durable build that stands the test of time.
features: Classic leather upper for a clean, timeless look
Nike Air cushioning for all-day comfort
Perforated toe box for breathability
Rubber outsole for grip and durability
careInstructions: Clean with a soft brush and mild soap. Air dry. Avoid bleach or harsh chemicals.

name: Jordan 4 Retro Blue
description: The Jordan 4 Retro Blue brings back a fan-favorite silhouette with bold blue accents, premium materials, and signature Flight details that celebrate heritage and performance.
features: Durable leather upper with mesh inserts for breathability
Visible Air-Sole unit in the heel for responsive cushioning
Molded TPU wings and lace locks for secure fit
Herringbone outsole pattern for traction and grip
careInstructions: Spot clean with a soft brush and gentle soap. Do not submerge in water. Air dry only.

name: Jordan 1 Green
description: The Jordan 1 Green updates the original high-top silhouette with rich green accents and timeless design. Featuring premium materials and Air cushioning, it's a staple on and off the court.
features: Premium leather upper with classic color blocking
Encapsulated Air-Sole unit for responsive cushioning
Solid rubber outsole for traction and durability
Padded collar for ankle support and comfort
careInstructions: Wipe clean with a soft cloth. Use leather conditioner as needed. Do not machine wash.
